task.title: Set up the index directory
task.shortdesc: You must provide a path to the directory where you want to store the index data. We recommend you to start with the web_crawler folder provided in the examples folder.

step.cmd: Enter the absolute path of the index directory.

choices.choice: On Unix/Linux/Mac systems, enter the absolute path, for example: /home/me/open-search-server/examples/web_crawler
On Windows systems, enter a Windows UNC pathname, for example: \\ComputerName\SomeFolder\open-search-server\examples\web_crawler
